name: The Dancer: Insurgence
description:
Take back the earth

The Dancers have taken everything from you. Now its your turn. Fight through the Dancer mothership to destroy the aliens from the inside

Take the fight to them

This time you won't be so easy to kill. Thanks to all your time practising in your helicopter, you now have the ability to wallrun. Oh yeah, you also HAVE A GUN.

The epic conclusion

The Dancer: Insurgence marks the end of the epic dancer trilogy. Stay tuned for more dancer-related news however! You never know what could happen...

As always, have fun! - spacepiano :D
